title: As Scandals Continue To Hit Fraternities, How Can Misconduct Be Prevented?
teaser: Three fraternities have been suspended or closed this month alone. NPR's Kelly McEvers speaks with Caitlin Flanagan, a writer for The Atlantic, about her year-long investigation of the Greek system.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
